turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me a peach tea green tea lemonaide

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure what starbucks do you want me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go to the one on Haun rd

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do want me to go in and order or get it online?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go in and order it that way it can be made just right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, I'd like a venti size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With 6 extra pumps of Peach sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Go it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lite ice

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything extra?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure they make it then add 6 extra pumps after that way it will be just right

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay 6 extra on top of what they add

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes thats right

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else do you want a pastry?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me two Birthday cake pops

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what if they don't have those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: then get me a cranbery scone or a lemon loaf cake

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Go it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

items.name: Can you get me a peach tea gr
